text: vinandi! Bhakti kevalam allah koraku matrame pratyekincabadindi! Ika ayananu vadali itarulanu sanraksakuluga cesukune varu (ila antaru): "Varu mam'malni allah sannidhyaniki cercutarani matrame memu varini aradhistunnamu!" Niscayanga allah varilo unna bhedabhiprayalaku taginatluga vari madhya tirpu cestadu. Niscayanga, allah asatyavadiki, krtaghnuniki margadarsakatvam ceyadu
